Add, remove, or list volumes in the current [[dimension]]. This command is set to be removed in [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.20|''Bedrock Edition'' 1.21.20]].

== Syntax ==
:<code>volumearea add <identifier: string> <from: x y z> <to: x y z> <name: string></code>
::
:<code>volumearea list [all-dimensions: VolumeAreaAllDimensions]</code>
::
:<code>volumearea remove <name: string></code>
::
:<code>volumearea remove <position: x y z></code>
::
:<code>volumearea remove_all</code>
::
